TopicTitle: ThunderBirds Interplanetary Transport Work Thread-B-1 and F-1 are here!

Articles.Content:
ThunderBirds Interplanetary Transport: Ad astra, per cognitionem.

Employees: halocon720 (Founder/CEO), Munstation (spacecraft designer)

Well, I've decided to make myself a nice organized main thread for my upstart KSP spacecraft company, and I hope to post some stuff in the near future. Also, I may not be posting for around 2 weeks, as I'll be in Hawaii starting the 28th. Anyway, let's get started!

(On a side note, most of these will require MechJeb, which you can take off if you want, but even so, look for the MechJeb modules, or Avionics Package in the case of planes.)

Interceptors:

The F-4 Aerospike is the pinnacle of Kerbal rocket-interceptor tech, at least in my game. This plane is not meant to go long distances. It is meant for short-range flights.

The F-1 is a relic from my early 0.16 days in KSP. It was my first attempt at a jet and it turned out surprisingly well.

Orbiters:

The Loki OIV (Orbital Insertion Vehicle) is a jack-of-all-trades orbiter that can get you up and home again. Side note: please remove my lift vehicle, as it will not work anymore.
Edited October 18, 2012 by halocon720
better .craft file

Rescue Ships:

The Rescuer I is designed to rescue stranded crews from alien worlds. Make your own launch vehicle, replace the lander's engines if you want. Requires NovaPunch, MechJeb, and Crewtank.

Bombers:

The B-1 ThunderBird is a proven intercontinental bomber that can strike targets at great distances. Turn on the SAS as soon as the plane gets in the air, as it is impossible to fly without SAS. Also, go close to the ground when you drop the bombs.

Here is a link to the bomb part for the plane: http://www.kerbalspaceprogram.net/kerbal-space-program-mods#wing

It's a .rar file, so you need 7-Zip or such to open it.

Edited October 17, 2012 by halocon720
mod link
Any feedback would be appreciated. I hope to come out with more rockets and spaceplanes in the future, but for now it's just simple stuff. That's why I need the feedback.
Greetings Halocon, I honestly like the F4, looks nice and flies nicely

Greetings Halocon, I honestly like the F4, looks nice and flies nicely

Thanks for the feedback, Sbowyer! I might make a bigger plane in the future, as soon as I can actually make one that flies
Trying to make my first bomber, the B-1 ThunderBird. Once it's released, please don't complain about turning, as it is meant to go straight.

B-1 is (and has been, for a couple days now) released! This bomber is proven to have intercontinental capabilities and can strike targets across the ocean. Getting back is another story.

In other news, I've just remade my very first jet from when I started playing KSP, the F-1. .craft file will come shortly.

F-1 .craft file is up and running, so why not download it? The F-1 was my first successful jet and it has great handling, fuel capacity and range.

Don't forget to leave some feedback!

Edited October 18, 2012 by halocon720
